pull.title: rpc: Add missing description of vout in getrawtransaction help text
pull.body: In `getrawtransaction` the vout did not have a description. I gave it the same description as the one used in `decoderawtransaction`.

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -109,7 +109,7 @@ static RPCHelpMan getrawtransaction()
                                  {RPCResult::Type::OBJ, "", "",
                                  {
                                      {RPCResult::Type::STR_HEX, "txid", "The transaction id"},
-                                     {RPCResult::Type::STR, "vout", ""},
+                                     {RPCResult::Type::STR, "vout", "The output number"},
comments.body: Why is this a STR? Should be numeric
